itemListElement.name: Makeup
itemListElement.description: Shop the best makeup now at Sephora and earn points with every purchase! Not yet a Beauty Insider? Join now for FREE!

itemListElement.name: Skincare
itemListElement.description: Shop skincare products at Sephora. Find top-rated products from leading skincare brands to help target specific skin concerns and revitalize your look.

itemListElement.name: Hair
itemListElement.description: Explore our top-rated hair care products at Sephora. Browse an unrivaled selection of shampoos, conditioners, styling products, hair color and more from top brands.

itemListElement.name: Fragrance
itemListElement.description: Shop fragrances for women and men at Sephora. Find your favorite perfume or cologne or accentuate your style with a new scent.

itemListElement.name: Tools & Brushes
itemListElement.description: Shop beauty tools and accessories at Sephora. Find top-rated makeup tools, brushes, applicators, spa tools and more from leading brands.

itemListElement.name: Bath & Body
itemListElement.description: Shop bath & body products at Sephora. Find an unrivaled selection of the top moisturizers, cleansers, lotions, exfoliants, scrubs and more from top brands.

itemListElement.name: Sale
itemListElement.description: Makeup sales are always on at Sephora. Shop discounted makeup, skincare, fragrance and hair care products at Sephora today. Free shipping and samples available.
